1384158627716497420.text: Just as I do each and every April 19th, today I pause to honor and remember the children, mothers, fathers, and neighbors who are no longer with us, because while memorials don’t take the pain away our devotion living up to their memory can help shape a better future for us all.

1384158626521042944.text: 26 years to the day, I’m reminded of the kindness & service Oklahomans took upon themselves to help those who were affected, and I remain grateful for each person- from the responders to now @TheJusticeDept AG Garland - who answered the call of service in our darkest moment.

1384158625405411333.text: The moment that should have defined Oklahoma with a dark past has instead inspired a great state and filled its people with a sense of community, strength, adoration- traits seen each and every day in the Oklahoma Standard.

1384158623463448590.text: Each and every April 19th- no matter the weather or busyness of our lives- Oklahoma pauses to reflect and remember what happened on the block of 5th Street between Harvey and Robinson.

1242179379993739269.text: Students should be focused on staying healthy, not worrying about their growing loan balance. The #CARESAct provides much-needed flexibility for the leaders of our higher education institutions and the students who rely on federal student aid to pursue an education.

1242179378823548928.text:
Flexibility to our nation's schools, students, and borrowers. 

The #CARESAct supports steps taken by @usedgov to support our school administrators, providing waivers to school districts that are necessary during the #coronavirus outbreak.

1242179377732947968.text:
The bill also provides @USDA with the resources needed to assist producers by temporarily increasing the Commodity Credit Corporation borrowing authority by $20 billion. 

And includes $25.06 billion for @USDANutrition to carry out important feeding programs.

1242179376030060544.text:
Assists and strengthens the security of American agriculture. 

The #CARESAct ensures that our food supply chain remains safe and strong by providing $33 million to support staffing and overtime expenses for @USDAFoodSafety inspectors at federally inspected slaughter facilities.

1242179375124144128.text:
Investments in America's health care providers and increased access to care for patients. 

The #CARESAct encourages public-private health care partnerships- increasing innovation- and provides $1.32 billion to Community Health Centers- vital to states like Oklahoma.

1242179372876005376.text:
Historic assistance to America's businesses and direct relief for families across the country. 

The #CARESAct provides $500 billion in relief to American businesses, expands unemployment benefits by $250 billion, and ensures a one-time tax rebate putting America's workers first.

1242179371781283844.text:
America's laid-off workers cannot wait. Struggling Main Street businesses cannot wait. Our hospitals and health centers cannot wait.

The Senate must pass the bipartisan crafted #CARESAct, strengthening the American economy & providing relief to our communities' small businesses!
